name: Beef Stroganoff II
author: sal
summary: Beef Stroganoff is typically a rich dish, yet it's quite simple to make. This recipe uses nonfat sour cream to help cut down on the fat content.
ingredients: 1 pound sirloin steak, cut into bite size strips
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 ¼ cups fat free sour cream
directions: Brown the beef strips in a large skillet over medium high heat and drain excess fat
Add the onion and saute for 5 minutes, or until tender
Stir in the flour, salt, paprika and ground black pepper
Add the soup, reduce heat to medium low and let simmer for 15 minutes
Then add the sour cream, stirring well
Prepare egg noodles according to package directions
Serve beef mixture over the egg noodles
